A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This \"thing\" broke the sequel triology for me. Good thing I can aways count on the OT and the prequels. This movie has no proper charater development (in some cases they devolve\, like in Finn's case)\, it breaks the   established lore (the lighspeed crash/air and gravity in open space)\, and is an overall mess. Hope this debacle subverted Disney expectations for the franchise.
